snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include layoffs at Zynga and a former Microsoft executive’s foray into the marijuana retailing business.
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include layoffs at Zynga and a former Microsoft executive’s foray into the marijuana retailing business.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Tumblr and College Admissions, and an X-Rated App for Google Glass
